sentence.Network_en: To ease the situation, your child's pediatrician may recommend adenoidectomy.
sentence.Network_cn: 为解决这个问题, 儿科医生会推荐做腺样体切除术.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To evaluate the advantages of utilizing endoscope in adenoidectomy.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要目的探讨鼻内镜下经鼻腺样体切除术的疗效和优缺点.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion: Adenoidectomy was effective in treating the junior Secretory Otitis Media.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论: 腺样体切除术是治疗儿童分泌性中耳炎的有效方法.
